job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Are a born consultant that understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions
   * Use Python to deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
   * Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
   * Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects
   * Technically guide junior ML engineers
   * Deliver technical workshops for clients
   * Leverage your expertise to help sales qualify and land exciting projects
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

* Are a born consultant that understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions
   * Use Python to deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
   * Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
   * Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects
   * Technically guide junior ML engineers
   * Deliver technical workshops for clients
   * Leverage your expertise to help sales qualify and land exciting projects

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and deploying production-ready ML models and pipelines, aligning strongly with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer. While it mentions consulting and client interaction, the primary technical focus is on model deployment and research exploration, fitting the 'MLOps' and 'Modeling' aspects of the ML Engineer profile.

phrases: understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions
Leverage your expertise to help sales qualify and land exciting projects
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to comprehend business requirements and translate them into technical strategies, as well as supporting sales by leveraging technical knowledge.

phrases: deploy production ready pipelines
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'production ready pipelines' directly relates to the creation and maintenance of data infrastructure for model deployment.

phrases: deploy production ready ML models
Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
job_tasks.justification: This covers the core aspect of working with ML models, including their deployment and the exploration of new research and frameworks.

phrases: deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
job_tasks.justification: Deploying models and pipelines on the cloud involves software development practices to ensure they are functional and integrated.

phrases: deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects
Technically guide junior ML engineers
job_tasks.justification: Deploying models in production, ensuring project delivery quality, and guiding junior engineers are all key aspects of MLOps and team leadership in an engineering context.
